comment: tell the police to dip ammo in blood. They won't be martyrs if shot by tainted bullets.
amr:
# ::snt tell the police to dip ammo in blood. They won't be martyrs if shot by tainted bullets.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / tell-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (d / dip-01
                  :ARG0 (p / police)
                  :ARG1 (a / ammo)
                  :ARG2 (b / blood))
            :ARG2 p)
      :snt2 (m2 / martyr-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (t2 / they)
            :condition (s / shoot-01
                  :ARG2 (b2 / bullet
                        :ARG1-of (t3 / taint-01)))))

comment: : Police official: Hostage-taker at Paris market appears linked to newspaper attack suspects
amr:
# ::snt : Police official: Hostage-taker at Paris market appears linked to newspaper attack suspects
(s / say-01
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (p2 / police)
                  :ARG2 (o / official)))
      :ARG1 (a / appear-02
            :ARG1 (l / link-01
                  :ARG1 (p3 / person
                        :ARG0-of (m / manage-01
                              :ARG1 (h2 / hostage))
                        :location (m2 / market
                              :location (c / city
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Paris"))))
                  :ARG2 (p4 / person
                        :ARG2-of (s2 / suspect-01
                              :ARG1 (a2 / attack-01
                                    :ARG0 p4
                                    :ARG1 (n2 / newspaper)))))))
